divs: Sighting DetailsI was going to work going eastbound on Kettleman Rd. When In front of me I saw a red light flashing with a white light next to it. I figure it was a slow moving plane. I would guess it was about 2000 feet up northeast from where I was driving, moving southwest towards south Lodi at about 200 mph per hour. As I was watching a green light came on that was not blinking on the other side of the object. As it got closer to my position I could see it was a black triangle shape object. I follow the craft for about 10 minutes until I lost sight of it.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lockeford
There were no other sightings in Lockeford on or around November 17th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
